Chapter 2 Toby command data 2.1 Setup 2.2 Loading Toby’s command data 2.3 plotting data 2.4 Proportion graph 2.5 Counts graph

Chapter 2 Toby command data 2.1 Setup # loading packages library(tidyverse) library(here) library(reactable) library(reactablefmtr) library(magrittr) library(RColorBrewer) 2.2 Loading Toby’s command data # loading in data toby_command_data <- read.csv( file = here::here("toby_data", "TobyCommandUsageStore.csv") ) # making commands all lowercase (there were both snuggle and Snuggle) toby_command_data <- toby_command_data %>% mutate("Command"=tolower(Command)) # presenting data in table form reactable( toby_command_data, filterable = TRUE, compact = TRUE, bordered = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 5, theme = reactableTheme( style = list(fontFamily = "-system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif")) ) 2.3 plotting data # changing command column type into factor toby_command_data$Command <- toby_command_data$Command %>% factor(levels = unique(toby_command_data$Command)) # counting number of command usages and calculating the proportion based on the total commands used toby_command_data_mutated <- toby_command_data %>% count(Command) %>% mutate(proportion = n / sum(n)*100) # ordering commands based on proportion toby_command_data_mutated <- toby_command_data_mutated %>% mutate( "commands_ordered"=reorder( toby_command_data_mutated$Command, toby_command_data_mutated$proportion, decreasing = TRUE) ) # plotting command data against the proportion toby_command_data_mutated %>% ggplot(aes(x = commands_ordered, y = proportion, fill=commands_ordered, label=round(proportion, 1))) + geom_col(position = position_dodge()) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 60, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")+ geom_text(size = 3.5, nudge_y = 2, angle = 60) + labs( title = 'Proportions of Toby Junior commands', y = "proportion (%)", x = "commands" ) # plotting command data against the counts toby_command_data_mutated %>% ggplot(aes(x = commands_ordered, y = n, fill=commands_ordered, label=round(n, 1))) + geom_col(position = position_dodge()) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8, angle = 60, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")+ geom_text(size = 3.5, nudge_y = 20, angle = 60) + labs( title = 'Counts of Toby Junior commands', y = "counts", x = "commands" ) 2.4 Proportion graph 2.5 Counts graph
Chapter 3 Toby Junior command data 3.1 Setup 3.2 Loading Toby’s command data 3.3 plotting data 3.4 Proportion graph 3.5 Counts graph

Chapter 3 Toby Junior command data 3.1 Setup # loading packages library(tidyverse) library(here) library(reactable) library(reactablefmtr) library(magrittr) library(RColorBrewer) 3.2 Loading Toby’s command data junior_command_data <- read.csv( file = here::here("junior_data", "JuniorCommandUsageStore.csv") ) # making commands all lowercase (there were both snuggle and Snuggle) junior_command_data <- junior_command_data %>% mutate("Command"=tolower(Command)) # presenting data in table form reactable( junior_command_data, filterable = TRUE, compact = TRUE, bordered = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 5, theme = reactableTheme( style = list(fontFamily = "-system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif")) ) 3.3 plotting data # changing command column type into factor junior_command_data$Command <- junior_command_data$Command %>% factor(levels = unique(junior_command_data$Command)) # counting number of command usages and calculating the proportion based on the total commands used junior_command_data_mutated <- junior_command_data %>% count(Command) %>% mutate(proportion = n / sum(n)*100) # ordering commands based on proportion junior_command_data_mutated <- junior_command_data_mutated %>% mutate( "commands_ordered"=reorder( junior_command_data_mutated$Command, junior_command_data_mutated$proportion, decreasing = TRUE) ) # plotting command data against the proportion junior_command_data_mutated %>% ggplot(aes(x = commands_ordered, y = proportion, fill=commands_ordered, label=round(proportion, 1))) + geom_col(position = position_dodge()) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 11, angle = 60, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")+ geom_text(size = 3.5, nudge_y = 1, angle = 60) + labs( title = 'Proportions of Toby Junior commands', y = "proportion (%)", x = "commands" ) # plotting command data against the counts junior_command_data_mutated %>% ggplot(aes(x = commands_ordered, y = n, fill=commands_ordered, label=round(n, 1))) + geom_col(position = position_dodge()) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 11, angle = 60, hjust = 1), legend.position = "none")+ geom_text(size = 3.5, nudge_y = 50, angle = 60) + labs( title = 'Counts of Toby Junior commands', y = "counts", x = "commands" ) 3.4 Proportion graph 3.5 Counts graph
